resources.string: \ Sudoku is a logic-based number placement puzzle. Starting with a partially completed 9x9 grid, the objective is to fill the grid so that each row, each column, and each of the 3x3 boxes (also called blocks) contains the digits 1 to 9 exactly once.

\ The purpose of the game is to discover as many words as possible within a jumbled square of sixteen randomly selected letters. A valid word can only be formed if each letter is contiguous (i.e. side-by-side, above or below, or on the diagonal) with the next, and no letter position can be used more than once in any given word. If you look at the sample board at the top-right corner of this page, you will see we can spell the word SUPER by starting with the S, then going diagonally to the U, then up to the P, diagonally to the E and finally, diagonally to the R. We could also make the word SPURT starting from the same title, but note that we could not make the word SPURTS, because the only contiguous S has already been used at the beginning of that word. Scoring is according to the length of the word. 3 letter word give 3 points and so on.

"The game follows normal Boggle rules. 
 You are supposed to make words of length 3 or more. 
 You can only create words using alphabets adjacent to the alphabet that you pressed before. 
 On each correct word formed you get a increase on your score. 
 You can input each word once."

Virtual Treasure, as the name suggests, is a treasure hunt for virtual goods. 
Now you can engage in exciting and interesting games with your friends by leaving them virtual treasures in the form of
 1. Facebook Contacts
 2. Twitter Contacts
 3. URLs
 4. Private Messages
 If you find yourself sitting around an interesting place and want your friends to visit the same, well .... drop them a treasure which they can only unlock by coming to that specific place ! You can now include all your friends on Twitter and Facebook so nobody feels left out. Hey and amidst all this excitement, you can even get some exercise by walking to these treasure points. Download the app to begin your journey into the realm of Virtual treasures... and if you need any help, well call up Indiana Jones !

How to use the application? 

 Login Options : 

 To start using the application you must login :
 1. You can either login using your Facebook account
 2. You can create an account with us.

 After Login : 

 Once you have logged in you can do the following :

 Create treasure :
 You can create treasures for your Facebook friends or add recipients on your own. There are a wide variety of treasures that you can create. So get creative !

 Look around and find treasures using the camera on your phone. The treasures which are far away will show on the top of your screen while the ones around you will show around you.

 Tap on a treasure to unlock and enjoy it !
Acknowledgements:\nPhones used for testing : Nexus One
